```lisp
[
  (:action plug
    ; Plug various devices into each other to establish connections
    :parameters (?device1 - object ?device2 - object ?location - location)
    
    :precondition (and 
      (at ?device1 ?location) 
      (at ?device2 ?location) 
      (or
        (and (has_hdmi_input ?device2) (is_hdmi_converter ?device1))
        (and (is_hdmi_converter ?device2) (is_hdmi_cable ?device1))
        (and (has_av_composite_output ?device2) (is_hdmi_converter ?device1))
      )
      (not (connected ?device1 ?device2))
    )
    
    :effect (connected ?device1 ?device2)
  )
]
```
